name: Banality Man
description:
FEATURES:

  • Meaningful choices that lead to wildly different outcomes
  • GIF-style animated characters
  • Music from Jonathan Coulton, the Beastie Boys, Screaming Females, Swearin', Dan Deacon, and more.*
  • Original soundtrack of background music
  • No limbs
  • A standalone story with connections to past and future KONOL Games titles, including the Beretta Mondatta series

*These are songs released under Creative Commons licenses that the artists have pre-approved for certain noncommercial uses (which is why Banality Man is, and always will be, free).

RATING:

Contains strong language and stick-figure-on-stick-figure violence.

CREATED BY:

Yossarian III (@yossarianiii, yossarianiii.wordpress.com)

KONOL Games (konolgames@gmail.com)
